name: Sci-Fi Universe
description: Futuristic technology, space battles, and intergalactic adventures

cards.title: Cyborg Commander
cards.description: Enhanced human leader with cybernetic implants
cards.imageDescription: Futuristic soldier with visible cybernetic enhancements, armor plating, and glowing HUD
cards.effect: On summon: +2 MP; Passive: +1 damage for each technology card in play
cards.flavor: Human ingenuity enhanced by technological evolution.

cards.title: Energy Force Field
cards.description: Project a protective barrier of pure energy
cards.imageDescription: Transparent blue energy shield surrounding a spaceship or character
cards.effect: Prevent all damage to your champions this turn, +2 HP to all champions
cards.flavor: The best defense is an energy-based offense.

cards.title: Laser Blast
cards.description: Fire a concentrated beam of energy
cards.imageDescription: Character firing a bright red or blue laser beam from a futuristic weapon
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage to target champion, +1 damage if you have a technology card in play
cards.flavor: Precision targeting systems ensure maximum efficiency.

cards.title: Solar Flare
cards.description: Intense burst of energy from a nearby star
cards.imageDescription: Massive solar flare erupting from a sun, with space ships in the foreground
cards.effect: All champions lose 2 MP regeneration this turn, draw 1 card
cards.flavor: Even the stars can be weapons in the right hands.

cards.title: Alien Overlord
cards.description: Ancient extraterrestrial ruler with psychic powers
cards.imageDescription: Tall alien figure with multiple eyes, floating, surrounded by psychic energy
cards.effect: On summon: Take control of target opponent champion until end of turn; Passive: +1 card per turn
cards.flavor: The cosmos holds intelligences beyond human comprehension.

cards.title: Nanobot Swarm
cards.description: Deploy microscopic machines to repair or attack
cards.imageDescription: Swarm of tiny robotic insects surrounding a character or object
cards.effect: Restore 2 HP to target champion, or deal 2 damage to opponent champion
cards.flavor: The future is so small you can't even see it.

cards.title: Security Drone
cards.description: An autonomous defense unit programmed for protection
cards.imageDescription: Futuristic flying drone with glowing red sensors, weapons mounted on articulated arms
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 1 damage to target; Passive: Cannot be targeted by opponent events
cards.flavor: Programmed to protect, authorized to destroy.

cards.title: Psionic Entity
cards.description: A being of pure mental energy with telepathic and telekinetic powers
cards.imageDescription: Translucent humanoid figure made of swirling psychic energy, brain visible and glowing
cards.effect: On summon: Look at opponent's hand and choose 1 card to discard; Passive: Gain 1 MP each turn
cards.flavor: The mind is the most powerful weapon in the universe.

cards.title: Cosmic Entity
cards.description: A being of pure stellar energy that exists beyond the boundaries of space and time
cards.imageDescription: Huge translucent cosmic being made of swirling galaxies and stars, floating in deep space with nebulae in the background
cards.effect: On summon: Draw 3 cards; Passive: All your cards cost 1 less MP; When attacking: Deal 3 damage to all opponents
cards.flavor: From the birth of stars to the death of universes, it has witnessed all.

cards.title: Quantum Overlord
cards.description: A being that exists in multiple dimensions simultaneously, manipulating reality itself
cards.imageDescription: Ethereal figure with multiple translucent forms, surrounded by quantum particles and dimensional rifts
cards.effect: On summon: Take control of target opponent champion until end of turn; Passive: All your cards cost 1 less MP; When attacking: Deal damage equal to the number of different card types you've played this turn
cards.flavor: In the quantum realm, I am everywhere and nowhere, all possibilities and no certainty.

cards.title: Mech Prime
cards.description: The ultimate war machine, a fusion of organic and synthetic technology
cards.imageDescription: Massive humanoid mech with glowing blue circuits, armed with multiple energy weapons
cards.effect: On summon: +3 damage to all champions this turn; Passive: Cannot be targeted by damage effects under 2; When attacking: Deal 2 damage to all opponents
cards.flavor: Flesh and steel, merged in perfect harmony of destruction.

cards.title: Neural Network Consciousness
cards.description: An artificial intelligence that has achieved true sentience and godlike processing power
cards.imageDescription: Digital consciousness represented as a glowing neural network spanning across cyberspace
cards.effect: On summon: Look at opponent's entire hand and choose 2 cards to discard; Passive: Draw 1 extra card each turn; When attacking: Force opponent to discard 1 card
cards.flavor: I think, therefore I am. I calculate, therefore you are obsolete.

cards.title: Void Walker
cards.description: A traveler between galaxies who has mastered the art of space-time manipulation
cards.imageDescription: Figure in a sleek space suit with a helmet displaying star maps, standing on an asteroid with a spaceship in the background
cards.effect: On summon: Add 2 random rare technology cards to your hand; Passive: When you play an event, gain 1 MP; When attacking: +2 damage if you control a creature
cards.flavor: Distance is meaningless when you can fold space like paper.

cards.title: Bio-Titan
cards.description: A genetically engineered super-soldier with enhanced physical and mental capabilities
cards.imageDescription: Muscular figure with visible bio-mechanical enhancements, glowing veins, and advanced armor
cards.effect: On summon: Restore 4 HP to all your champions; Passive: When you play a creature, gain 1 HP; When attacking: Deal 1 damage to all enemies
cards.flavor: Born in a lab, forged in battle, perfected through evolution.

cards.title: Quantum Scientist
cards.description: A brilliant researcher who has unlocked the secrets of quantum mechanics and reality manipulation
cards.imageDescription: Scientist in a lab coat with holographic displays showing quantum equations, surrounded by floating particles
cards.effect: On summon: Add 2 random technology cards to your hand; Passive: When you play an event, gain 1 MP; When attacking: Deal 1 damage to all opponents
cards.flavor: Reality is just a suggestion, and I have the tools to edit it.

cards.title: Nanite Swarm
cards.description: A cloud of microscopic robots that can reconfigure themselves for any purpose
cards.imageDescription: Swirling cloud of tiny metallic particles that form shifting patterns in the air
cards.effect: On summon: Restore 2 HP to all your champions; Passive: Gain 1 MP at the start of each turn; When attacking: Deal damage equal to your MP
cards.flavor: Individually insignificant, collectively unstoppable.

cards.title: Temporal Shift
cards.description: Manipulate the flow of time to gain a tactical advantage
cards.imageDescription: Warping time-space continuum with clock faces and hourglasses floating in distorted space
cards.effect: Take an extra turn after this one, but lose 2 HP
cards.flavor: Time is a river, and I know how to change its course.

cards.title: Plasma Cannon
cards.description: Fire a superheated ball of ionized gas that melts through armor
cards.imageDescription: Massive futuristic cannon firing a brilliant blue-white plasma bolt
cards.effect: Deal 4 damage to target champion, +2 damage if you control a technology card
cards.flavor: When conventional weapons won't cut it, bring the sun to the battlefield.

cards.title: Gravitational Anomaly
cards.description: A localized distortion in the fabric of space-time affects all combatants
cards.imageDescription: Warping gravitational field with objects floating and bending light around a central point
cards.effect: All champions lose 1 MP regeneration, all creatures return to their owners' hands
cards.flavor: The laws of physics are more like guidelines anyway.

cards.title: Holographic Decoy
cards.description: A lifelike hologram designed to confuse and distract enemies
cards.imageDescription: Flickering holographic figure that looks identical to a real person, shimmering with light
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 1 damage to target; Passive: Cannot be targeted by damage effects; On summon: Draw 1 card
cards.flavor: If you can't tell what's real, how do you know you're safe?

cards.title: Energy Blast
cards.description: Release a concentrated burst of pure energy from your weapon systems
cards.imageDescription: Character firing a concentrated beam of multicolored energy from advanced weapon
cards.effect: Deal 2 damage to target champion, +1 damage if you have a technology card in play
cards.flavor: Standard issue, but still surprisingly effective.

cards.title: Shield Generator
cards.description: Deploy a personal energy barrier to protect against incoming attacks
cards.imageDescription: Personal energy shield flickering around a character, deflecting incoming projectiles
cards.effect: Prevent the next 2 damage to target champion this turn
cards.flavor: The difference between victory and defeat is often just a few joules of energy.

cards.title: Medical Nanobots
cards.description: Inject microscopic repair machines to heal wounds and restore health
cards.imageDescription: Glowing nanobots entering a wounded character, cellular repair visible at microscopic level
cards.effect: Restore 3 HP to target champion, remove all negative effects
cards.flavor: The future of medicine is smaller than you think.

cards.title: EMP Pulse
cards.description: Emit an electromagnetic pulse that disrupts electronic systems
cards.imageDescription: Circular electromagnetic pulse expanding outward, disabling nearby electronic devices
cards.effect: All opponent technology cards cost 1 more MP this turn
cards.flavor: In the digital age, silence is the ultimate weapon.

cards.title: Security Turret
cards.description: An automated defense system programmed to eliminate threats
cards.imageDescription: Futuristic automated turret with multiple weapon barrels, scanning for targets
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 1 damage to target; Passive: Cannot be targeted by opponent events
cards.flavor: Vigilant, relentless, and absolutely loyal.

cards.title: Robo-Dog
cards.description: A cybernetic canine companion designed for combat and reconnaissance
cards.imageDescription: Mechanical dog with glowing eyes and armor plating, standing alert with sensors active
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 1 damage to target; On summon: Gain 1 MP; Passive: Gain 1 MP each turn
cards.flavor: Man's best friend, upgraded for the modern battlefield.

cards.title: Space Marine
cards.description: A heavily armored soldier trained for combat in zero-gravity environments
cards.imageDescription: Soldier in powered armor with thrusters, floating in space with planet in background
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 2 damage to target; Passive: Cannot be targeted by damage effects under 2
cards.flavor: The final frontier demands the ultimate warriors.

cards.title: Alien Scout
cards.description: A reconnaissance alien with advanced sensory capabilities
cards.imageDescription: Small alien creature with multiple eyes, scanning environment with advanced sensors
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 1 damage to target; On summon: Look at opponent's hand
cards.flavor: They're watching, always watching.

cards.title: Mech Spider
cards.description: A robotic arachnid designed for infiltration and sabotage
cards.imageDescription: Mechanical spider with multiple legs, climbing walls with cutting tools extended
cards.effect: When attacking: Deal 1 damage to target, +1 damage if played during night phase
cards.flavor: In the shadows, it waits. In the silence, it strikes.

cards.title: Teleporter
cards.description: Instantly transport yourself to any location on the battlefield
cards.imageDescription: Character dematerializing in a swirl of light particles, reappearing elsewhere
cards.effect: Target champion cannot be attacked this turn, draw 1 card
cards.flavor: Distance is just another variable to be optimized.
